definition.name: Azure MYSQL Deploy
definition.description: Deploy to Azure MySQL database using SQL script files
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: server-name
inputs.description: Server name of Azure DB for Mysql. Example: fabrikam.mysql.database.azure.com. When you connect using Mysql Workbench, this is the same value that is used for Hostname in Parameters

inputs.name: connection-string
inputs.description: The connection string, including authentication information, for the Azure MySQL Server. (deprecated)

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: Azure MySQL Server username for login

inputs.name: password
inputs.description: Azure MySQL Server password for login

inputs.name: database
inputs.description: Azure MySQL Server database (optional) to connect to. No database will be used automatically.

inputs.name: sql-file
inputs.description: Path to SQL script file to deploy

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.description: Additional options supported by mysql simple SQL shell. These options will be applied when executing the given file on the Azure DB for Mysql.
